item.description:
By popular demand! Please join us for the first Scrabble Enthusiasts of Boston Potluck snackathon. Avoid the dress code and enjoy food and games in a more casual, night-time setting than Au Bon Pain.

The potluck will be hosted by Steven S., who lives in Harvard Square. Exact address will be sent closer to the date of the event to those who RSVP yes. Space is limited, but if this proves popular we may have another potluck Meetup in the future.

Bring a snack or beverage to share, as well as a Scrabble board and optionally any other word games that you enjoy. Quinten will bring at least Snatch-It, Bananagrams, and Quiddler in addition to Scrabble.
item.name: Scrabble Enthusiasts of Boston Potluck Snackathon
